Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following an incident at Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following a recent incident at Howard.

Shuttle bus service is available between Howard and Skokie/Dempster, serving all affected stations during normal hours of operation.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include the #97 Skokie bus route.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute near Lawndale/26th
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses rrted NB: Central Park, 26th, & Lawndale; SB: Lawndale, 26th, Central Park, 31st, & Lawndale due to, street blockage near Lawndale/26th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 26th/Lawndale, due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via Central Park, 26th, and Lawndale.

Southbound buses will operate via Lawndale, 26th, Central Park, 31st, and Lawndale.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line and Purple Line Express Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red & Purple Line Exp. trains are running w/residual delays  following an earlier sick passenger at Wilson. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line and Purple Line Express trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick passenger at Wilson.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
